snippet: The new Taymour Grahne Gallery in TriBeCa couldn’t wish for a more auspicious kickoff than its excellent inaugural show of new paintings and drawings by Nicky Nodjoumi.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews exhibit Chasing the Butterfly and Other Recent Paintings, featuring works by painter Nicky Nodjoumi, at Taymour Grahne Gallery.
lead_paragraph: The new Taymour Grahne Gallery in TriBeCa couldn’t wish for a more auspicious kickoff than its excellent inaugural show of new paintings and drawings by Nicky Nodjoumi.

headline.main: Nicky Nodjoumi: ‘Chasing the Butterfly and Other Recent Paintings’
headline.print_headline:
Nicky Nodjoumi: ‘Chasing the Butterfly and
Other Recent Paintings’
